text: Three Murderesses (, ) also known as Women Are Weak is a 1959 French Italian comedy movie directed by Michel Boisrond and starring Alain Delon, Pascale Petit, Myl√®ne Demongeot, Pierre Mondy, Jacqueline Sassard. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Michel Boisrond
